config.jsInOrder: src/angliciser.js src/greenerturtle.js src/indexeddbservice.js src/indexeddbstoragecontroller.js src/graphcommandlanguage.js src/querymanager.js src/uniquer.js src/treepicker.js src/fsm.js src/editui.js src/coloredtreepicker.js src/treectrl.js src/predicate.js src/taxon.js src/sortedset.js src/gclui.js src/hsv.js src/hsl.js src/edge.js src/node.js src/textcursor.js src/quadParser.js src/multistring.js src/oncerunner.js src/dndloader.js src/settingswidgets.js src/settings.js src/huviz.js

scripts.watch:dev: onchange -i -k server.js lib/huviz.js package.json -- npm start
scripts.watchTest: onchange -i -k server.js lib/huviz.js package.json test/* -- npm run test
scripts.watchTestFSM: onchange -i -k server.js lib/huviz.js package.json test/* -- npm run test -- --grep FiniteState
scripts.DEPRECATED:buildSrcDocs: npx docco -o srcdocs  server.coffee src/*.coffee | node bin/make_srcdocs_index.js > srcdocs/index.md && npx marked srcdocs/index.md > srcdocs/index.html
